name: NPR
text: Studies of inexpensive steroids, including the generic drug dexamethasone, have found that they can reduce deaths in patients hospitalized with serious cases of COVID-19. https://t.co/nuyF3fcqwU

name: NPR
text: The number of COVID-19 cases has increased by some 220% in Lebanon after the massive explosion at Beirut’s port, which forced 3 of the capital city’s major hospitals to close and partially damaged 3 others. https://t.co/vScMXeq44f
